revision.text: {{Wireless embedded system |brand=Linksys |model=WRT54G3G |revision=v1.0 |asin= |manuf_country= |is_manuf=No |manuf=CyberTAN |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=EoL |est_release_date= |fcc_date=06/08/2006 |fcc_id=Q87-WRT54G3G |ic_id=3839A-WRT54G3G |pcb_id=3762-12145002 |type=wireless router, 3G gateway |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM4712;BCM4712KPBG, HA0738 P11, 835046 P2; |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Intel |fla1_model=JS28F320C3BD70 |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=HY5DU281622ETP-J |expansion_if_types=PCMCIA (32-bit) |expansion_pcmcia_num=1 |jtag= |serial=yes,, 5-pin header,, internal,, unpopulated,, 3.3V TTL |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4712;BCM4712KPBG, HA0738 P11, 835046 P2; |wi1_chip2_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip2_model=BCM2050;BCM2050KMLG, TS0748 P11, 849007; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM5325E;BCM5325EKQMG, HG0748 P11, 849378 1A; |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=100M |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=Single Slot PC CardBus Controller;Texas Instruments;PCI1510;PCI1510, 7A79A6JRW, G4;1; |flags=3G modem |stock_os= |tp_firmware=OpenWrt, DD-WRT |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:22:6B |oui_eth=00:22:6B }} {{TagLine|Wireless-G Router for 3G/UMTS Broadband}} :{{SupportPage|vendor=Linksys|model=WRT54G3G}} "3762-12145002" is silkscreened on the board. :OEM: [[CyberTAN]] ([[Linksys]]/[[Cisco]]/[[Belkin]]) *[https://oldwiki.archive.openwrt.org/doku.php?id=oldwiki:openwrtdocs:hardware:linksys:wrt54g3g ''Linksys WRT54G3G'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki] :AT (AT&T), ST (Sprint), VT ([[Verizon]]) :Known working 3G modem PCMCIA cards: :*[[Sierra Wireless]] AirCard 595 (Sprint) :*''Merlin'' U630 ([[Vodafone]]) :*[[Huawei]] E600 ==Images== __NOTOC__
